job_details.Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Developer for UX-centric App
job_details.Functieomschrijving: I am seeking a seasoned full-stack software developer to assist in the creation of a dual Web and Mobile application. This application will primarily focus on user authentication and profiles, employing a two-factor authentication system for enhanced security., Develop a mobile-first, user-friendly interface
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer for UX-centric App

I am seeking a seasoned full-stack software developer to assist in the creation of a dual Web and Mobile application. This application will primarily focus on user authentication and profiles, employing a two-factor authentication system for enhanced security., Develop a mobile-first, user-friendly interface

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional full-stack development for a web and mobile application, emphasizing user authentication and profiles. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profiles.

phrases: creation of a dual Web and Mobile application
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core software development activities related to building user-facing applications across different platforms.

phrases: two-factor authentication system for enhanced security
soft_skills.justification: The mention of a two-factor authentication system indicates a focus on security, which aligns with responsible development practices.
Designing a 'user-friendly interface' implies a focus on solving user experience problems and adopting a pragmatic approach to development.
